item.title: 3 Steps to Actually Letting Go of what Wounds Us.
item.description:
3 Steps to Actually Letting Go of what Wounds Us.

get elephant's newsletter Using art as therapy. Sometimes drawing it out is the best release. I admit it and am not afraid to declare, my name is Kim and I dwell on most things. I dwell on thoughts I have had, thoughts I should have had, things I said, things I should have said, decisions I have made, should have made or shouldn't have made.
